name: WKPreferences
desc: An object that encapsulates the standard behaviors to apply to websites.

items.name: var minimumFontSize: CGFloat
items.desc: The minimum font size, in points.

items.name: var tabFocusesLinks: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether pressing the tab key changes the focus to links and form controls.

items.name: var javaScriptCanOpenWindowsAutomatically: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether JavaScript can open windows without user interaction.

items.name: var isFraudulentWebsiteWarningEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the web view shows warnings for suspected fraudulent content, such as malware or phishing attemps.
